author: HANNAH SEIBOLD The News-Review
title: Seaside man arrested after manhunt | News | nrtoday.com
text: Billy James Best, of Seaside, was arrested around 9 a.m. Thursday after reportedly eluding officers Wednesday evening. [] Seaside man arrested after manhunt Hannah Seibold is a reporter at The News-Review. She can be reached at [hseibold@nrtoday.com](mailto:hseibold@nrtoday.com) or 541-672-3321.
